opinion:
541 U.S. 901

CITY OF LITTLETON, COLORADO
v.
Z. J. GIFTS D-4, L. L. C., DBA CHRISTAL'S.

No. 02-1609.

1

C. A. 10th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 944.] Motion of petitioner for divided argument denied. Motion of Ohio et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument granted.
